title.narrative: Facility for Oil Sector Transparency (FOSTER) - Procurement of Services

description.narrative: This activity (Facility for Oil Sector Transparency (FOSTER) - Procurement of Services) is a component of Facility for Oil Sector Transparency (FOSTER) reported by FCDO, with a funding type of 'Procurement of Services' and a budget of £13,158,416. This component benefits Nigeria, and works in the following sector(s): Public finance management (PFM), Domestic revenue mobilisation. , with the following implementing partners: International Alert, Oxford Policy Management. The start date is 01-06-2009 and the end date is 30-04-2016.

owner-org.narrative: UK - Foreign, Commonwealth and Development Office (FCDO)

mailing-address.narrative: Public Enquiry Point, Abercrombie House, Eaglesham Road, East Kilbride, Glasgow G75 8EA

description.narrative: Accountability - General Public Service - Accountability - debt and aid management
